title: A.J. Green Interview, Playoff Picture, Jimmy G Top 10? (Football (12/20)
description:
Nick Kostos, Will Brinson and Pete Prisco bring you the midweek edition of the Pick Six podcast. The guys discuss the NFC playoff picture following the Falcons Monday Night Football victory, and if Atlanta is actually a threat in the conference. That's followed by analysis on rulings in the Cowboys-Raiders game, the 2-game suspension issued to Panthers LB Thomas Davis, and if the Packers will sit Aaron Rodgers. Next, it's America's favorite podcast game show, 'Hot Take or Just Right.' Then, star Cincinnati Bengals wide receiver A.J. Green joins Nick to discuss what has been happening in Cincy this season, including his take on the Marvin Lewis situation, what it was like to play for Hue Jackson, his altercation with Jaguars CB Jalen Ramsey, his trust in Andy Dalton, AJ McCarron's potential and much more!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
